oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Daguerreotype of Capt. Flavel L. Barber
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cased daguerreotype of Capt. Flavel L. Barber, Co. A, 3rd (Brown's) Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Barber wears a double-breasted Confederate officer's front coat with a dark cuff and dark collar. The "chicken guts" piping on the sleeves are appropriate for Confederate officers. Barber was killed in action at Resaca, Ga. on May 14, 1864.
